title: FS: SGC Graded T206: HOF, SL, S460, 30-60
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: SGC Graded T206: HOF, SL, S460, 30-60
posts.post_content:
Quite a mixed bag here... some toughies (Sovereign 460 and a Browne Washington Sovereign), HOF, Southern League, etc.  Grades from SGC 30 to 60.  List and prices (including delivery) below.  Paypal preferred:

[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/t206hound/sgc-graded[/url]

AVAILABLE
Dave Brain - S350 SGC40 - $50
Mordecai Brown (Cubs On Shirt) - P150 SGC30 - $130
Harry Davis (Davis On Front) - PB SGC30 - $30
Johnny Evers (With Bat, Chicago On Shirt) - P350 SGC35 - $150
Lou Fiene (Throwing) - P350 SGC55 - $75
Bill Graham - P350 SGC30 - $25
Jack Knight (With Bat) - S350 SGC40 - $50
Harry Krause (Pitching) (gotta be the best 60 EVER) - P350 SGC60 - $130
Pryor McElveen - P350 SGC45 - $40
Jimmy Phelan - S350 SGC45 - $60
Bud Sharpe - P350 SGC50 - $50

CONSIGNED

Hal Chase (Throwing, Dark Cap) - P350 SGC40 
Doc Crandall (Portrait, With Cap) - S460 SGC35 
Bill Hallman - P350 SGC60

Herbie Moran - S350 SGC30

Hi Eri-ck,

I will take the Schreck Polar Bear Sgc 60 for $120 if it is still available.

If you could please, PM me your Paypal address & I will pay for it later today.

Thanks,


Jantz
